Collection.LongName: MODIS/Terra Surface Reflectance Daily L2G Global 1km and 500m SIN Grid
Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Surface Reflectance Daily L2G Global 1km and 500m SIN Grid V005
Collection.Description: MODIS/Terra Surface Reflectance Daily L2G Global 1km and 500m SIN Grid
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: This data set was provided by the NASA EOS Project.

Contact.HoursOfService: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

Address.StreetAddress: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND3
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 3 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND4
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 4 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND5
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 5 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND6
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 6 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND7
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 7 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT250MBAND1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 250m band 1 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable). A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT250MBAND2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 250m band 2 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable). A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: RESOLUTIONBANDS1AND2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Nadir spatial resolution (meters) of MODIS bands 1 and 2

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 1 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 2 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) . A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

OnlineResource.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
